articles.title: 26-year-old tech CEO Pava LaPere found dead at Baltimore apartment building; homicide investigation underway - CBS News
articles.description: Police said Pava LaPere's body was found with signs of blunt-force trauma Monday morning. LaPere was the CEO of EcoMap.
articles.content: BALTIMORE -- A homicide investigation is underway after Pava LaPere, the 26-year-old CEO of a Baltimore technology company, was found dead at a Mount Vernon apartment building Monday morning, police … [+5818 chars]
